data.title: Paul Randolph in the studio with Alice Cooper...

data.text:
We came in to a lovely e-mail the other morning from long term friend and Ashdown artist Paul Randolph. Paul sent us a note to say he recorded bass on the new EP and will be going into the studio to continue work on the NEW Alice Cooper album.

See Paul's note below:

"I just wanted to give you a quick heads up that I played bass on the new Alice Cooper EP that comes out this Friday the 13th recorded here in Detroit. I used my trusty Ashdown RM-500-C210, Bob Ezrin is the producer, he loved my tone. Here's a link to 1 of the songs:"

It is nice to hear such great comments about the Rootmaster combo! They really are very versatile amps perfect for gigging or in the studio.
